= Action name = PCK.AUTOMIC_FILESYSTEM.PUB.ACTION.PACK
= General description = This action archives a file or a directory with all sub-items with wildcard support or add files to an existing archive. Supported archive types are zip, tar and tar.gz for both windows and Unix systems.
= Failure Conditions = -If the provided source path does not exist. -If the Target file exists and 'Add to existing archive' is set 'NO'
= Inputs = - Path to source directory or file*: Provide the full path of the source file/directory. - Source files/directories name (Wildcard Supported): Comma-separated(if multiple) Wildcards for files and directories, e.g.,- *.jpg, ab*.txt, LOG*, myfile.* Here, the 'LOG*' will be interpreted as folder pattern and *.jpg, ab*.txt, myfile.* will be file patterns. In case if there are files which match 'LOG*' or folders which match ab*.txt, they will also be included in the contents of zip. - Path to target file*: Provide the name of the target bundle with full path. - Archive type: Type of archive - zip, tar, tar.gz - Add .zip/.tar to filename: If set to YES, the extension is added to the file name - Add to existing archive: If target file exists and then the input files are added to the existing archive
= Behavior = * The action will generate an archive at the target path.
=Return Value= None
= Outputs = * Return code is 0 in case of success. * Return code is non-zero in case of failure.
= Rollback = (none)
= Logging = AE logs will be displayed in the AE report. PARAM: Path to source directory or file = D:\temp\tmp2test\src\ PARAM: Path to target file = D:\temp\tmp2test\dest\out PARAM: Archive wildcards = *.bmp PARAM: Archive type = zip PARAM: Add .zip/.tar to filename = YES PARAM: Add to existing archive = YES INFO: D:\temp\tmp2test\src is checked for being a dir/file and if it exist INFO: ISDIR(1) ISFILE(0) EXIST(1) INFO: ------------------------------ INFO: D:\temp\tmp2test\dest\out.zip is checked for being a dir/file and if it exist INFO: ISDIR(0) ISFILE(1) EXIST(1) INFO: ------------------------------ PARAM: Temporary PACK directory = C:\Automic\Automation.Platform\Agents\windows\temp\PACK_0001029009
= Example =
1. Source directory/filename: home/temp/Details.txt Source files/directories name(Wildcard supported): Target directory/filename: home/temp1/out Archive type: zip Add .zip/.tar to filename: YES Add to existing archive: NO
Output: The Details.txt file of home/temp dir is archived into home/temp1/out.zip
2. Source directory/filename: home/temp/ Source files/directories name(Wildcard supported): Target directory/filename: home/temp1/out Archive type: tar Add .zip/.tar to filename: YES Add to existing archive: NO
Output: All files of home/temp dir is archived into home/temp1/out.tar .
3. Source directory/filename: home/temp Source files/directories name(Wildcard supported): Target directory/filename: home/temp1/out Archive type: tar.gz Add .zip/.tar to filename: YES Add to existing archive: Yes
Output: All content of home/temp is added to the existing archive(if archive exists) or created new arcive into home/temp1/out.tar.gz .
4. Source directory/filename: C:\temp Source files/directories name(Wildcard supported): *.pdf, Na* Target directory/filename: C\temp1 Archive type: zip Add .zip/.tar to filename: YES Add to existing archive: NO
Output: All files and folders matching wildcard pattern of C:\temp is archived into C:\temp1.zip .If pattern matches a folder then all folder content is archived, otherwise if pattern matches a file then all files in source as well as its sub-directories are archived. Folder structure is maintained.
5. Source directory/filename: C:\temp\Details.txt Source files/directories name(Wildcard supported): *.pdf, Na* Target directory/filename: C\temp1 Archive type: tar Add .zip/.tar to filename: YES Add to existing archive: NO
Output: The Details.txt file of C:\temp dir is archived into C:\temp1\out.tar . Wildcards are ignored.
6. Source directory/filename: C:\temp Source files/directories name(Wildcard supported): *.pdf, Na* Target directory/filename: C\temp1\out Archive type: tar.gz Add .zip/.tar to filename: YES Add to existing archive: YES
Output: All files and folders matching wildcard pattern of C:\temp is added to the existing archive(if archive exists) or created new arcive into C:\temp1\out.tar.gz . If pattern matches a folder then all folder content is archived, otherwise if pattern matches a file then all files in source as well as its sub-directories are archived. Folder structure is maintained.
